page.title: 11Education & Customs
page.content: A special date for the school is May Day Bank Holiday when the{May festival is celebrated.They dance around the Maypole at{Ickwell Green}with children from Caldecote Lower and Northill Lower Schools. After school the parents and villagers sometimes use the school hall for badminton amongst other activites. Most of the children in the school come from {Chicksands U.S. Air Base}as there is no school near them.They can start school before the age of five which is unusual for this area.There are few children of school age living in Old Warden village itself.
